name: d3-table-layout
description: Graph layout with nodes grouped in foldable tables, for d3

scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdirp build && rollup --extend -f umd -g d3-force:d3,d3-quadtree:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-table-layout.js -- index.js
scripts.prepare: npm run test && terser build/d3-table-layout.js -c -m -o build/d3-table-layout.min.js
